H0.text: Which French racehorse, which won the Derby and Prix de I’Arc de Triomphe in 1965, was the highest rated horse by Timeform until Frankel’s performances in 2012. Ribot

H1.text: Which French racehorse, which won the Derby and Prix de I’Arc de Triomphe in 1965, was the highest rated horse by Timeform until Frankel’s performances in 2012. Relko

H2.text: Which French racehorse, which won the Derby and Prix de I’Arc de Triomphe in 1965, was the highest rated horse by Timeform until Frankel’s performances in 2012. Dahlia

H3.text: Which French racehorse, which won the Derby and Prix de I’Arc de Triomphe in 1965, was the highest rated horse by Timeform until Frankel’s performances in 2012. Sea-Bird

A4.text: Sea-Bird was given a rating of 145 by Timeform for the year 1965, the highest awarded to any horse in the 20th century.

A5.text: Sea-Bird is most famous for his victories in two of Europe's most prestigious races, the Epsom Derby and the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe.
